009package GenericFilterDemos;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilterVector;
015import imagingbook.common.image.PixelPack;
016
017/**
018 * This ImageJ plugin shows how to construct a 3x3 custom generic vector filter
019 * based on class {@link GenericFilterVector}.
020 * This plugin works for all types of images.
021 * 
022 * @author WB
023 * @version 2022/03/30
024 *
025 */
026public class Custom_Generic_Filter_Vector implements PlugInFilter {
027
028
029    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
030        return DOES_ALL;
031    }
032
033    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
034        new ExampleFilterVector3x3().applyTo(ip);    
035    }
036
037    // -------------------------------------------------------------
038    
039    private static class ExampleFilterVector3x3 extends GenericFilterVector {
040        private final static float[][] H = {
041                        {1, 2, 1},
042                        {2, 4, 2},
043                        {1, 2, 1}};
044        
045        private final int width = 3;
046        private final int height = 3;
047        private final int xc = 1;
048        private final int yc = 1;
049        private final float s = 16;
050        
051        @Override
052        protected float[] doPixel(PixelPack pack, int u, int v) {
053                int depth = pack.getDepth();
054                float[] sum = new float[depth];
055                for (int j = 0; j < height; j++) {
056                        int vj = v + j - yc;
057                        for (int i = 0; i < width; i++) {
058                                int ui = u + i - xc;
059                                float[] p = pack.getPix(ui, vj);
060                                for (int k = 0; k < depth; k++) {
061                                        sum[k] = sum[k] + (p[k] * H[i][j]) / s;
062                                }
063                        }
064                }
065                return sum;
066        }
067    }
068}
